message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CR, cs.NE 

This paper is primarily focused on machine learning and specifically on the problem of learning robust representations. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses adversarial inputs and their impact on model robustness, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper includes experiments on downstream classification tasks, which could place it in cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the proposed unsupervised learning method for obtaining robust representations involves maximizing mutual information, which is a common technique in cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
